alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 8:51PM CDT until May 05 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 850 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hershey, or 11 miles west of North Platte, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Platte, Sutherland, Hershey, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Coker, O`Fallons and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 156 and 173. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
